content: 1 mini leggy frog you will need 3 5mm hook 8ply dk weight wool 8 or 12 pony beads safety eyes sml amount fire resistant stuffing usa crochet terms yusc - yarn under single_crochet body with 3 5mm hook and green chain 11  *yusc across the row ch1 turn  repeat* yusc across the row for 30 row  fasten_off leave a long tail for sewing up arms/ legs make 2 with 3 5mm hook chain 50 mark this stitch and chain 3 more - work back down start in the 2nd chain from hook  finger 1- slip_stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch into the marked stitch repeat  finger 2- ch3 slip_stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch  finger 3- ch3 slip_stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch  slip_stitch down the chain cut your yarn leaving an extra long tail  thread on your beads 4 or 6 works best use a thin darning needle  pick back up using your extra long tail and make the other hand/foot  making 3 fingers ch3 slip_stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch x3  fasten_off \ 1 assembly instructions  insert safety eyes and add a smile  lay your arms and legs in a cross x so one side is an arm and the other is a leg  add a little stuffing  fold and sew closed skipping over the limbs just enough so they can move freely but not too much the stuffing can come out patterndesign byb screate crafts pdf writtenupbycolin s yarn magic please do not copy republish or addto anygroupfileswithoutpermission myimagesshouldnotbe used for anypurpose 2
